itu-mmpo.def: This is the proportion of individuals who own a mobile telephone. An individual owns a mobile cellular telephone if he/she has a mobile cellular phone device with at least one active SIM card for personal use. It includes mobile cellular phones supplied by employers that can be used for personal reasons (to make personal calls, access the Internet, etc.) and those who have a mobile phone for personal use that is not registered under his/her name.
itu-mmpo.name: Male mobile phone ownership as a % of total male population
